title: Jardiniere, 1770s
markings: On underside, underglaze in ochre, signed with monogram: "C PO [conjoined]
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Horizontal rectangular form with everted and shaped rim; base with feet flanking shaped lower edges. White-glazed body with blue, green, and yellow decoration of flowers and garlands surrounding central oval cartouche showing man and woman dancing or frolicking in meadow.

tombstone.epitaph: Jardiniere, 1770s. Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-8.
